mapper.select: SELECT d.id, d.date, d.file_path, CONVERT(d.content USING utf8) AS content, s.sticker_path FROM daily AS d INNER JOIN sticker AS s ON d.sticker_id=s.id WHERE d.user_id=#{user_id} AND date_format(d.date, %M)=#{month}
SELECT id, date, file_path, CONVERT(content USING utf8) AS content FROM daily WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO daily (date, file_path, content, user_id, sticker_id) VALUES (#{date}, #{file_path}, #{content}, #{user_id}, #{sticker_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE daily SET file_path=#{file_path}, content=#{content}, sticker_id=#{sticker_id} WHERE id=#{id}
